question: Under which of the following INA comrades, Officersâ€™ Training School for INA officers was opened in 1943?
explanation: Officers Training School for INA officers was opened under Habib ur Rahman. Azad School for the civilian volunteers were set up to provide training to the recruits. For the first time in Asia a women`s regiment, the Rani of Jhansi regiment was raised as a combat force, under Captain Laxmi Swaminathan.
